description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. A gritty zombie shooter focused on refined game mechanics. Xbox LIVE and local multiplayer co-op zombie killing action. Use turrets, nukes, mini-guns and chainsaws to go on a 4 player coop rampage killing zombies and anything else that moves. A deep weapon loadout and perk system to allow you to choose how you play, from cluster mines, to air strikes to flame throwers and everything in between.
description.short: A gritty zombie shooter focused on refined game mechanics. Xbox LIVE and local multiplayer co-op zombie killing action. Use turrets, nukes, mini-guns and chainsaws to go on a 4 player coop rampage killing zombies and anything else that moves. A deep weapon loadout and perk system to allow you to choose how you play, from cluster mines, to air strikes to flame throwers and everything in between.
